description: This file contains test cases for the integration of the 'Agent' class with the 'Gemini' model, focusing on structured responses for movie scripts and recipes, including usage of enums and Pydantic models.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a movie script with fields for setting, ending, genre, name, characters, storyline, and rating.

classes.name: Grade
classes.description: An enumeration representing movie grades from A+ to F.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a recipe with a name and a rating of type Grade.

methods.name: test_structured_response_with_dict_fields
methods.description: Test function that verifies the structured response for a movie script with dictionary fields.

methods.name: test_structured_response_with_enum_fields
methods.description: Test function that verifies the structured response for a recipe with enum-based rating.
